sections.general: INTERNATIONAL CODE COUNCIL (ICC) SPECIAL INSPECTOR AND CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS TECHNICIAN (CMT)
sections.objective:
My objective is to obtain and secure a meaningful position integrating my skills with the expertise of my co-workers, resulting in a successful
service provided to the client. Additionally, I am eager to gain knowledge through my own hard work and the tutelage of my superiors to earn
advancement within the organization.

work.

14 years progressively advancing experience in civil construction

materials testing and inspection.
while remaining within budget.

collaborative effort to complete task at hand.
integrity and professionalism.
